_header: O painful heart in pains sight
_description: A disconsolate lover — two cross-rhymed quatrains

BodRawD913.First Lines:
O painefull hart in peiyns syȝht[ ] fo to [
                    ]…
BodRawD913.Last Lines:
…[ ] true love in hart hathe slayn[ ] & yet in londe
                    dotthe in exchu
BodRawD913.Note: Ffirst stanza virtually unreadable due to wear and damp.
BodRawD913.Editions:
Frankis,  P. J. 
             “Some Late Middle English Lyrics in the Bodleian Library.” 
             Anglia
         73 (1955): 299-305: 299.
